trans-unit.source: … then this plugin is for you!
trans-unit.target: … then this plugin is for you!

trans-unit.source: SEO Enhancer — Generates robot indexing guidelines, HTML tags, and structured data. Useful if you want to control how your site appears in search engine results.
trans-unit.target: SEO Enhancer — Generates robot indexing guidelines, HTML tags, and structured data. Useful if you want to control how your site appears in search engine results.

trans-unit.source: SEO Report — Generates an HTML report based on article analysis, indicating what is good, what could be improved, and what is problematic. Useful if you want to improve the ranking of your articles.
trans-unit.target: SEO Report — Generates an HTML report based on article analysis, indicating what is good, what could be improved, and what is problematic. Useful if you want to improve the ranking of your articles.

trans-unit.source: :logo: and :image: fields are not required by Schema.org but are by Google.
trans-unit.target: :logo: and :image: fields are not required by Schema.org but are by Google.

trans-unit.source: A robots.txt file will be generated at your web site root, as per the OUTPUT_PATH setting (Pelican’s default is output/).
trans-unit.target: A robots.txt file will be generated at your web site root, as per the OUTPUT_PATH setting (Pelican’s default is output/ ).

trans-unit.target: Esquema del artículo

trans-unit.source: Contributing
trans-unit.target: Contribuyendo

trans-unit.source: Contributions are welcome and much appreciated. Every little bit helps. You can contribute by improving the documentation, adding missing features, and fixing bugs. You can also help out by reviewing and commenting on existing issues.
trans-unit.target: Contributions are welcome and much appreciated. Every little bit helps. You can contribute by improving the documentation, adding missing features, and fixing bugs. You can also help out by reviewing and commenting on existing issues.

trans-unit.source: Each path element has a ListItem, even folders, so it’s better to create a user-friendly page for those (otherwise you’ll get your server’s default page).
trans-unit.target: Each path element has a ListItem , even folders, so it’s better to create a user-friendly page for those (otherwise you’ll get your server’s default page).

trans-unit.source: Once the SEO analysis has generated a report, optimize your articles and pages according to the report’s recommendations, and then repeat the analysis to see whether everything comes up green.
trans-unit.target: Once the SEO analysis has generated a report, optimize your articles and pages according to the report’s recommendations, and then repeat the analysis to see whether everything comes up green.

trans-unit.source: Pelican plugin to improve SEO (Search Engine Optimization) to reach top positions on search engines.
trans-unit.target: El plugin Pelican para mejorar el SEO (Search Engine Optimization)para alcanzar las primeras posiciones en los motores de búsqueda.

trans-unit.source: Please keep in mind that the SITEURL Pelican setting must be defined in order for this plugin to function as intended.
trans-unit.target: Please keep in mind that the SITEURL Pelican setting must be defined in order for this plugin to function as intended.

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos

trans-unit.source: Robots.txt File
trans-unit.target: Archivo Robots.txt

trans-unit.source: SEO Enhancer
trans-unit.target: Mejorador de SEO

trans-unit.source: SEO Plugin for Pelican :fr:
trans-unit.target: Plugin de SEO para Pelican :fr:

trans-unit.source: SEO Report
trans-unit.target: Informe de SEO

trans-unit.source: SEO comes with two features to help you:
trans-unit.target: El SEO viene con dos características para ayudarle:

trans-unit.source: Structured Data
trans-unit.target: Datos estructurados

trans-unit.source: Structured data is based on Schema.org vocabulary, with JSON-LD encoding. Note that schemas generated by default are compliant with Schema.org but not (by default) Google-compliant. The latter requires additional metadata.
trans-unit.target: Structured data is based on Schema.org vocabulary, with JSON-LD encoding. Note that schemas generated by default are compliant with Schema.org but not (by default) Google-compliant. The latter requires additional metadata.

trans-unit.source: The SEO Enhancer automatically adds canonical link metadata to <head> tags in order to avoid presenting duplicate content to search engines.
trans-unit.target: The SEO Enhancer automatically adds canonical link metadata to <head> tags in order to avoid presenting duplicate content to search engines.

trans-unit.source: The SEO Enhancer automatically adds structured data in the <head> tag in order to improve the display of result snippets in search engines. Articles will have both article schema and breadcrumb schema, while pages will only have breadcrumb schema.
trans-unit.target: The SEO Enhancer automatically adds structured data in the <head> tag in order to improve the display of result snippets in search engines. Articles will have both article schema and breadcrumb schema, while pages will only have breadcrumb schema.

trans-unit.source: The SEO Enhancer module generates the following for you:
trans-unit.target: El módulo SEO Enhancer genera lo siguiente para usted:

trans-unit.source: The SEO analysis begins with the most recent articles/pages, according to the date metadata, and is focused on the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: The SEO analysis begins with the most recent articles/pages, according to the date metadata, and is focused on the following criteria:

trans-unit.source: The SEO plugin analyzes all your articles and pages and generate an SEO HTML report in your Pelican project root: seo-report.html
trans-unit.target: The SEO plugin analyzes all your articles and pages and generate an SEO HTML report in your Pelican project root: seo-report.html

trans-unit.source: The SEO plugin runs when you generate your site. If you want to see SEO logging in your console output, add the --verbose option to your pelican invocation:
trans-unit.target: The SEO plugin runs when you generate your site. If you want to see SEO logging in your console output, add the --verbose option to your pelican invocation:

trans-unit.source: The above information is defined in your source content, such as the following example Markdown file:
trans-unit.target: La información anterior se define en el contenido de la fuente,como el siguiente ejemplo de archivo Markdown:

trans-unit.source: The above installation step should automatically install Beautiful Soup 4, which the SEO plugin requires. The following command will manually install this dependency:
trans-unit.target: El paso de instalación anterior debería instalar automáticamente Beautiful Soup 4,que el plugin de SEO requiere.El siguiente comando instalará manualmente esta dependencia:

trans-unit.source: The generated robots.txt file indicates to search engines which pages they should index. By default, search engine bots are allowed to crawl and index all pages.
trans-unit.target: The generated robots.txt file indicates to search engines which pages they should index. By default, search engine bots are allowed to crawl and index all pages.

trans-unit.source: This plugin can be installed via:
trans-unit.target: Este plugin puede ser instalado a través de:

trans-unit.source: This plugin helps you improve your Pelican site SEO (Search Engine Optimization) to reach the top positions on search engines. To see what this SEO plugin can do for you, visit the Usage section.
trans-unit.target: This plugin helps you improve your Pelican site SEO (Search Engine Optimization) to reach the top positions on search engines. To see what this SEO plugin can do for you, visit the Usage section.

trans-unit.source: To disallow crawling and/or forbid indexing for a given article/page, add the following to your article/page metadata:
trans-unit.target: Para no permitir el rastreo y/o prohibir la indexación de un determinado artículo/página,añada lo siguiente a los metadatos del artículo/página:

trans-unit.source: To populate the :image: field, add an image metadata field to your Markdown/reST content:
trans-unit.target: To populate the :image: field, add an image metadata field to your Markdown/reST content:

trans-unit.source: To populate the :logo: field, add a LOGO setting to your Pelican settings file containing an absolute link to your site logo image:
trans-unit.target: To populate the :logo: field, add a LOGO setting to your Pelican settings file containing an absolute link to your site logo image:

trans-unit.source: To start contributing to this plugin, review the Contributing to Pelican documentation, beginning with the Contributing Code section.
trans-unit.target: To start contributing to this plugin, review the Contributing to Pelican documentation, beginning with the Contributing Code section.

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso

trans-unit.source: Why Use This Plugin?
trans-unit.target: ¿Por qué usar este plugin?

trans-unit.source: You can enable/disable features by setting them to True or False in your Pelican settings. The default is True for both.
trans-unit.target: You can enable/disable features by setting them to True or False in your Pelican settings. The default is True for both.

trans-unit.source: You can set limits for article and page analysis in the plugin settings.py. By default, it's set up to 10 articles and 10 pages.
trans-unit.target: Puedes establecer límites para el análisis de artículos y páginas en el plugin settings.py.De forma predeterminada,está configurado hasta 10 artículos y 10 páginas.

trans-unit.source: robots file
trans-unit.target: archivo de robots

trans-unit.source: structured data
trans-unit.target: datos estructurados

trans-unit.source: you are not familiar with SEO
trans-unit.target: no estás familiarizado con el SEO

trans-unit.source: you need help improving the SEO of your Pelican site
trans-unit.target: necesitas ayuda para mejorar el SEO de tu sitio Pelícano

trans-unit.source: you want an easy way to apply SEO fundamentals
trans-unit.target: quieres una forma fácil de aplicar los fundamentos del SEO
